name: Out of the Park Baseball 14
description: Out of the Park Baseball (OOTP) is the most sophisticated and best-selling baseball management game on the planet. Since its inception, OOTP has won numerous awards, including multiple "Sports Game of the Year" honors, en route to becoming the most immersive, realistic, and customizable baseball experience a fan can ask for. Now officially licensed by MLB.com and MiLB.com!
